newest.message:
== Breaking Changes ==
EMUU has been forcibly re-enabled due to changes in its behavior and settings. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi * Good speed
== New Features ==
* EVEMon now has a character contacts monitor. * EVEMon now has a character medals monitor. * EVEMon now has a character combat log monitor.
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a trivial bug (related with the taskbar) when EVEMon starts minimized. * Fixed (once again) a visual issue in API key management window when using large fonts. * Fixed a typo in the address that links to the EVE Dev site. * Fixed a bug where the contract status was not getting updated. * Fixes a calculation bug for the prefect ME in blueprint browser. * Fixed a bug when trying to use CharacterID API call in APITester feature. * Fixed a bug where the 'owned' icon of a skill was not properly updated in Skill Browser skill selector, when set from the plan editor.
== Enhancements ==
* Account status info are now shown in each character monitor. * Added mineral price feed from Eve Addicts in the Mineral Worksheet tool. * Added support for compressed responses (gzip, deflate) from CCP API server or 3rd party EVE API services. * Added info for failed and overdue contracts. * Contract details window is now vertically resizable when it contains list of items. * Time sync check is now done on daily bases if EVEMon is kept running continuously. * Added more info to Contract details window when contract is of type Courier and in progress. * Added estimated items value in Asset monitor (includes related columns). * Added ability to combine user set owned skillbooks combined with those found in a character's assets. * Replaced the 'Show Owned Skillbooks' message window with a list based window.
== Misc ==
* Design changes to About Window, removed redundant 'OK' button and fixed design issues when using large fonts. * Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better, faster and more stable application.
